definition[0]: relating to medicine and the treatment of disease or injury
note[0]: the medical profession (=doctors, nurses, and other people who treat people who are ill)
example[3]: a patient’s medical history (=the illnesses they have had)
example[4]: The injury required urgent medical attention.
definition[1]: an examination of your body by a doctor to see if you are healthy
definition[2]: connected with medicine and the treatment of illness and injury
example[5]: Medicare doesn’t cover all medical expenses.
example[6]: He has been absent from work for six weeks on medical leave.
